GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v6.0
GSD.description:
smb3: fix temporary data corruption in collapse range

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0 by commit fa30a81f255a56cccd89552cd6ce7ea6e8d8acc4, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 5476b5dd82c8bb9d0dd426f96575ae656cede140. For more details please see the references link.
